title: In game name, displays old name to some people on my friends list
body:
My old name is ninx strive, and i decided to change it a while ago. maybe 6 months ago? anyway, some people on my friends list have said to me that it still displays my old name and they cant view my profile within the launcher. 

And just before when i posted a comment on a discussion on the board. i hovered over my name and it said i was level 22 and my name was ninx strive. just really odd to me and would like a fix. thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm going to have to [defer this to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) as this is an account specific inquiry and we here on the boards are unable to assist with account related issues.
